# Release Notes + Versioning

## Rules

- Use SemVer unless repo dictates otherwise.
- Always include:
  - Highlights
  - Breaking changes + migration steps
  - Deprecations
  - Security fixes (high level)
  - Known issues

## Template

- [Release notes skeleton](./templates/release-notes.md)
